Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
January 2, 1951
Mr* Graydon Ausmus
V/UOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
I was completely carried away by the excellence
of your promotion piece, "The Story of 91,7*" I hope that
the President of your institution is fully aware of this
highly commendable job. My admiration for you rises with
each passing day.
I hope that the New Year brings you everything
that you wish for yourself. Congratulations, and keep up
the good work.
SNSsas
Representing non-commercial, educational AM and FM radio stations, workshops, and production centers,
owned and operated by colleges, universities, and public-service agencies.
